name: .WPB File Extension
summary: Learn about .WPB files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Image created with openCanvas 1.1, the free version of openCanvas drawing software before it became commercialized; often used for saving anime drawings and other digial art.

content: openCanvas allows users to record the drawing stroke events used to create WPB images, and then play them back in the software. Event files for openCanvas 1.1 use the .WPE extension.
NOTE: openCanvas now uses .OCI files for drawn images.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
